lead_paragraph: Shares of GoPro, the maker of wearable cameras, tumbled after the company issued disappointing results.

headline.print_headline: Moderate Gains on Wall St. as Investors Await January Jobs Report
headline.main: Market Inches Higher as Investors Await Jobs Data

snippet: Shares of GoPro, the maker of wearable cameras, tumbled after the company issued disappointing results.
abstract: Stocks rise modestly ahead of jobs report.
